attributes.action: Not To Have 25 Days National Lockdown After Christmas 2020
attributes.additional_details: It is no good for people’s mental health keeping imposing national lockdowns and tight restrictions on us all.  Domestic violence is high people stuck indoors not being able to meet different people,
attributes.background: This to be the National Lockdown and country to start finding other ways to deal with Covid19 and we have a vaccination which should stop National Lockdowns.  Stop closing things if enjoyment e.g. pubs and clubs and peoples businesses we need to start getting back to normality now they found a cure

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862
